description: Pumpkin Cinnamon Swirl Bread! Pumpkin Sandwich bread with a swirl of cinnamon and sugar. Yeasted Loaf. Makes great french Toasts. Vegan Breakfast Recipe. Makes 1 8.5 by 4.5 loaf. You can also use 9 by 5 loaf pan
name: Pumpkin Cinnamon Swirl Bread - Yeast Sandwich Bread
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)
1 cup unbleached white flour (or ap flour)
2 cups flour (I use 1 cup whole wheat and 1 cup unbleached white)
2 + tbsp coconut sugar or brown sugar
1 tsp pumpkin pie spice or cinnamon

recipeInstructions.text: In the mixer bowl, add warm hot non dairy milk, pumpkin puree, sugar, oil, and pumpkin pie spice and mix. Add flour and yeast and mix in until well combined, about 1-2 mins. Let this sponge sit for 45 minutes in a warm place.
